    • textFieldsValidationCheck

      public static String textFieldsValidationCheck(String name, String stock, String price, String max, String min, String partMachIdOrCompName, String empFieldErrMessage)
      This method checks to see if any text fields are empty and displays error messages to the user depending on the type of error.
      Parameters:
      name - name text field
      stock - inventory text field
      price - cost text field
      max - max inventory amount text field
      min - min inventory amount text field
      partMachIdOrCompName - either machine id or company name text field depending on whether the in-house or outsourced radio button is selected.

    • partValidationCheck

      public static String partValidationCheck(int stock, double price, int max, int min, String invalidInputMessage)
      This method checks to see if all inputs entered into the text fields are valid. If the inputs are invalid, then the method displays error messages to the user.
      Parameters:
      stock - part inventory
      price - part price
      max - part max inventory level
      min - part min inventory level
